url.description: The primary URL used to identify the instance.

id.description: The operator specified ID of this instance.

name.description: The visible name of the instance.

created.description: The time the instance was created.

creator.description: The account which created the instance.

owner.description: The organization which created the instance.

owner:fqdn.description: The FQDN of the organization which created the instance. Used for entity resolution.

owner:name.description: The name of the organization which created the instance. Used for entity resolution.

operator.description: The organization which operates the instance.

operator:name.description: The name of the organization which operates the instance. Used for entity resolution.

operator:fqdn.description: The FQDN of the organization which operates the instance. Used for entity resolution.
